@JennyBoylan @wesleyan_u @GratefulDead @lemieuxdavid In 1983 went to see them for Fri & Sat shows. I slept 2 nights at rest stop in New Haven. That was a 6 hr drive each way. I think Syracuse was the same distance.

@JennyBoylan @wesleyan_u @GratefulDead @lemieuxdavid I was at that show.... caught a ride with some tour heads from Springfield the night before, hitched back to Boston after the show for a shower and sleep, and then saw them down on the Cape for a couple of nights......  my last mini - tour until Europe 90‚Äô

41 years ago tonight the Boyos at New Haven Coliseum. Senior year @wesleyan_u

Lost my ride home in the parking garage, would up in the back of somebody‚Äôs pickup. I stared up at the starry sky. It was cold.
